name: FRAMED - Personalised HeARTwork - FOR LOCAL COLLECTION ONLY - From £15
description:
All Artwork found on my website can be sold with a frame....if you are Local (to Cramlington) and would like to collect.

There are 3 size options to choose from:
SMALL - A5 (half an A4...Normal letter size) £15
MEDIUM - A4 (Normal letter size) £20
LARGE - A3 (double an A4...Normal letter size) £30

Still...
100% Personalised!
100% Unique to you!

Click the size you want (from the drop down list) and add to cart. Once you have made payment...Please send me an email to
apieceofheart@hotmail.co.uk
with your chosen heartwork style, colour combo and text.

If you cant find a style you want...just send me an email with what you are looking for and I will design something for you.

Once your order is designed and you are happy....I will send you my address for collection.

Any Questions Please do not hesitate to email me.

description:

with your chosen heartwork style, colour combo and text.

If you cant find a style you want...just send me an email with what you are looking for and I will design something for you.

Your print will come rolled up in a tube through the post.

Postage price is based on 1st Class Recorded Signed for Delivery throughout the UK...any questions please dont hesitate to drop me a mail and I will get back to you asap.

name: Celebration Post Box - By Postboxes NE
description:
My Friend...
Postboxes NE is helping to Provide you with a safe & secure, yet classy alternative for the storage of your cards and gifts at your celebration.

Perfect for weddings, engagement parties, birthdays, christenings, leaving parties and many more imaginative 'celebrations'. We started off servicing just the North East of England (hence the name) however since then our postboxes have travelled the length of the UK at various locations for various occasions.

This also includes a personalised insert designed by Postboxes NE that you get to keep... a lovely memory of your special day!

Price £35 for daily hire, free delivery within 20 mile radius of ne12

For all enquiries and to check availability please contact Holly on
holly-davis@hotmail.com
or
07989 204 127
or
message me APOH via the message link and I will forward info onto her.
Thanks
APOH xx
